item.title: 东京电视台：日本日产可能寻求与本田合作
item.description: 据东京电视台周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，日本日产汽车公司正在考虑寻求与本田汽车公司建立业务合作伙伴关系。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor is considering seeking a business partnership with Honda Motor , TV Tokyo reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德告诉 MIPIM，美国写字楼市场是世界上供应最过剩的市场
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的一位高管周三表示，陷入困境的美国写字楼市场是世界上供应最过剩的市场，房地产投资者承担了过多的债务。【原文：The troubled U.S. office market is the world's most oversupplied and property investors have taken on too much debt, a Brookfield Asset Management executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 雷诺预计将于 4 月初完成与沃尔沃和达飞轮船公司的电动货车合资项目
item.description: 雷诺一位女发言人周三告诉路透社，雷诺与沃尔沃和法国达飞轮船集团（CMA CGM）的电动货车合资企业预计将于 4 月初完成。【原文：Renault expects the closing of its joint venture in electric vans with Volvo and French shipping group CMA CGM to happen by the beginning of April, a spokeswoman told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在巴西国家石油公司的股息纠纷中，首席执行官与卢拉分裂的内阁周旋
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）红利缺失造成的影响可能已经改变了该国营公司首席执行官与掌控董事会的能源部长之间角力的平衡。【原文：The fallout from a missing Petrobras dividend may have shifted the balance in a tug-of-war between the CEO of the state-run firm and the energy minister holding sway over its board.】

item.title: 法院裁定，尽管罚款 50 亿美元，美国联邦贸易委员会仍可重审 Meta 隐私案
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院裁定，尽管 Meta 公司已经支付了 50 亿美元的罚款并同意采取一系列保障措施，但它仍然无法阻止美国联邦贸易委员会重新调查其 Facebook 部门的隐私保护措施。【原文：Meta cannot stop the U.S. Federal Trade Commission from reopening a probe into its Facebook unit's privacy practices for now, a U.S. appeals court ruled, despite Meta's objections that it already paid a $5 billion fine and agreed to a range of safeguards.】

item.title: 比特币减半：比特币减半：何时发生，对价格意味着什么？
item.description: 随着比特币价格达到新的高度，人们开始关注其即将到来的 "减半"，以及它是否在比特币价格上涨中发挥了作用。【原文：As bitcoin's price reaches new heights, attention is turning to its upcoming "halving" and whether it is playing a role in its ascent.】

item.title: 银行气候小组成员报告资本市场排放量
item.description: 联合国支持的银行业气候联盟周三发布了最新的成员指南，要求他们披露更多有关如何计划减少碳排放的信息，包括首次披露来自资本市场活动的碳排放。【原文：A U.N.-backed banking climate coalition on Wednesday released updated guidance for members requiring them to disclose more about how they plan to cut carbon emissions, including for the first time those from their capital markets activities.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯老板称未计划在超级碗之后与叶诗文会面
item.description: 阿迪达斯首席执行官比约恩-古尔登（Bjorn Gulden）周三表示，上个月超级碗比赛结束后，他与说唱歌手叶在Instagram上的一篇帖子引发了人们的猜测。【原文：Adidas CEO Bjorn Gulden did not discuss business with rapper Ye when they met after the Superbowl last month, he said on Wednesday, after a post on Instagram by Ye, previously known as Kanye West, sparked speculation.】

item.title: 独家：意大利正与中国奇瑞洽谈汽车厂事宜
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，意大利政府正在与中国奇瑞汽车公司举行会谈，以吸引斯泰兰特之外的另一家大型汽车制造商进驻意大利，并提高本国的汽车产量。【原文：The Italian government is holding talks with China's Chery Auto as part of efforts to attract another major automaker to the country in addition to Stellantis and increase national car production, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 富国银行将美联储首次降息预期推迟至 6 月
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周三表示，预计美国联邦储备委员会将于 6 月份开始降息，而此前预计的降息时间为 5 月份。【原文：Wells Fargo on Wednesday said that it expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to start cutting interest rates in June, compared to its earlier expectation of a cut in May.】

item.title: Dollar Tree 季度亏损，关店计划产生超过 10 亿美元费用
item.description: Dollar Tree 周三出现季度亏损，此前该零售商计提了超过 10 亿美元的商誉减值费用，并计划关闭近 1000 家门店。【原文：Dollar Tree swung to a quarterly loss on Wednesday after the retailer took an over $1 billion goodwill impairment charge, as it plans to shut nearly 1,000 stores.】

item.title: Spotify 将测试完整音乐视频，与 YouTube 展开潜在对决
item.description: 瑞典音乐流媒体公司 Spotify 在面向高级订户的有限测试版中推出了全长音乐视频，进军 YouTube 统治了近二十年的领域。【原文：Swedish music streaming company Spotify is rolling out full-length music videos in a limited beta launch for premium subscribers, venturing into an arena that YouTube has dominated for nearly two decades.】

item.title: 大众汽车称其 ID.UNYX 车型已获中国政府批准
item.description: 大众汽车集团（中国）周三表示，其唯一一家控股合资企业--安徽大众汽车有限公司的首款车型已获得中国政府批准。【原文：Volkswagen Group China said on Wednesday that the first model by its only majority-controlled joint venture, Volkswagen Anhui, has received Chinese government approval.】

item.title: 礼来公司与亚马逊合作配送 Zepbound 和其他药物
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周三表示，该公司已邀请亚马逊公司的药房部门为其直接面向消费者的服务 "LillyDirect "配送处方药。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Wednesday it has brought on Amazon.com's pharmacy unit to deliver drug prescriptions sent to its direct-to-consumer service, LillyDirect.】

item.title: 早间竞标：撇开 CPI 转而人工智能，中国再次摇摆不定
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国众议院将投票迫使字节跳动剥离 TikTok 或面临禁令
item.description: 美国众议院计划于周三对一项法案进行表决，该法案将给予 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动约六个月的时间来剥离这款被约 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用在美国的资产，否则将面临禁令。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives plans to vote on a bill on Wednesday that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the U.S. assets of the short-video app used by about 170 million Americans or face a ban.】

item.title: 投资者为更多经济数据做好准备，期货持稳
item.description: 美国股指期货周三表现低迷，投资者在等待本周一系列经济数据，包括生产者价格和零售销售数据，以寻找美联储降息路径的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Wednesday as investors awaited a slew of economic data this week, including producer prices and retail sales numbers, for clues on the Federal Reserve's rate-cut path.】

item.title: 媒体报道出售 Optus 消息后，新加坡电信股价大涨 4%，随后停盘
item.description: 澳大利亚金融评论》（AFR）报道新加坡电信（SingTel）正在就出售其澳大利亚电信子公司 Optus 进行深入谈判后，该公司股价周三上涨近 4%，随后跌停。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications (SingTel) shares rose nearly 4% before being halted on Wednesday after the Australian Financial Review (AFR) reported the company was in advanced talks to sell its Australian telecommunications subsidiary Optus.】

item.title: 据 rbb 报道，特斯拉德国工厂已开始生产并投入运行
item.description: 据当地电台广播公司 rbb 报道，特斯拉位于德国格鲁恩海德的欧洲千兆工厂周三重新开始生产，此前，附近一座电塔遭到纵火袭击，导致工厂停电数日。【原文：Production started up again on Wednesday at Tesla's European gigafactory in Gruenheide, Germany, local radio broadcaster rbb reported, after an arson attack on a nearby electricity pylon led to a days-long power outage at the plant.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所运营商 SIX 因减值损失 11.5 亿美元
item.description: 瑞士证券交易所运营商 SIX 公布 2023 年亏损 10.1 亿瑞士法郎（约合 11.5 亿美元），此前，该公司计入了两项之前已公布的非现金减值。【原文：Swiss stock exchange operator SIX reported a loss of 1.01 billion Swiss francs ($1.15 billion) in 2023, after it booked two previously flagged non-cash impairments.】

item.title: 上田表示，日本央行认为工资谈判是刺激政策退出时机的关键
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，公司与工会之间正在进行的年度春季工资谈判对于决定何时逐步取消大规模刺激计划至关重要。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the ongoing annual spring wage negotiations between companies and unions are critical in deciding when to phase out its massive stimulus programme.】

item.title: 美罗银行在最后一刻推出拯救方案后，年度亏损额有所减少
item.description: 英国麦德龙银行（Metro Bank）周三公布的年度亏损额有所减少，原因是该行努力削减成本，并且在年底前进行了紧急注资，使资金流出趋于稳定。【原文：British lender Metro Bank posted a smaller annual loss on Wednesday, supported by its cost-cutting efforts and as outflows stabilised towards the end of the year after an eleventh-hour capital injection.】

item.title: 得益于新车，大众汽车预计西欧订单增长
item.description: 大众汽车（Volkswagen）周三表示，由于德国汽车制造商推出了新车型，预计未来几个月西欧的订单量将加速增长。【原文：Volkswagen said on Wednesday that it expects incoming orders in Western Europe to pick up speed in the coming months thanks to the German carmaker's new models.】

item.title: 日本加息预示金融市场进入新时代
item.description: 就在日本股市突破三十年高点仅几周之后，该国金融市场正急速走向另一个一代人中最长时期内从未见过的现象：利率上升。【原文：Barely weeks after Japanese stocks broke three-decade highs, the country's financial markets are hurtling toward another phenomenon not seen for the best part of a generation: rising interest rates.】

item.title: Zara 所有者 Inditex 将赌注押在高档时装和有竞争力的价格上，2023 年利润将增长 30%，达到 54 亿欧元
item.description: Zara 的所有者 Inditex 周三表示，由于这家快速时尚巨头将赌注押在高端购物者身上，并提供比 H&M 等竞争对手更具竞争力的价格，其 2023 年的净收入增长了 30%，达到 54 亿欧元（59 亿美元）。【原文：Zara owner Inditex said on Wednesday its net income for 2023 rose by 30% to 5.4 billion euros ($5.9 billion) as the fast-fashion giant bet on upmarket shoppers and offered more competitive prices than rivals such as H&M .】

item.title: 阿迪达斯警告 2024 年北美市场库存过剩销售额将下滑
item.description: 德国体育用品巨头阿迪达斯周三表示，预计今年在北美的销售额将出现下滑，原因是北美市场的库存仍然过剩，该公司正在继续出售其被砍掉的Yeezy系列运动鞋。【原文：German sportswear giant Adidas said on Wednesday it expects a decline in its sales in North America this year, blaming a still overstocked market there, as the company continues to sell off the sneakers from its axed Yeezy line.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行确认 2024-2026 年利润目标和红利
item.description: 法国最大的银行法国巴黎银行周三确认了未来三年的盈利目标和股息分配。【原文：BNP Paribas , France's largest bank, on Wednesday confirmed its profitability targets and dividend payouts for the coming three years.】

item.title: Zalando 预计 2024 年 GMV 将增长 0%-5
item.description: 德国在线时尚零售商 Zalando 周三表示，在报告了全年销售额下降之后，该公司预计将在 2024 年恢复增长，这符合其自身的预测范围。【原文：German online fashion retailer Zalando said on Wednesday it expects to return to growth in 2024, after reporting full-year decline in sales, in line with its own forecast range.】

item.title: 美国商务部长表示，美国企业热衷于实现供应链多样化，为泰国投资 "增效
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周三表示，泰国是希望实现供应链多样化的美国跨国公司的重中之重，他们已准备好 "加速 "对该国的投资。【原文：Thailand is a top priority for U.S. multinational firms looking to diversify supply chains, and they are ready to "supercharge" investments into the country, U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said on Wednesday.】

item.title: E.ON 将电网投资额提高至 460 亿美元，并对前景表示看好
item.description: 在欧洲大陆对现代化电网需求的推动下，欧洲最大的能源网络运营商 E.ON 将其五年投资目标提高了 27%，达到 420 亿欧元（460 亿美元），其利润前景甚至超过了最高预测。【原文：E.ON, Europe's top operator of energy networks, raised its five-year investment target by 27% to 42 billion euros ($46 billion) and gave a profit outlook that surpassed even the highest forecasts, driven by the continent's need for modern grids.】
